Alright Arelithians, do as we do best..

Here is a few rules on Arelith that may effects builders.

PrC - Certain Classes are simply unacheivable for the average joe. These classes are "RDD" and "Shifter" as they require a Level 21+ character of yours deleted and 30RPR.

Also on the subject of Classes. To become a Arcane Archer from a Ranger you only require 6 levels of Ranger, you do not require any Wizard levels.

Level Cap - Levels are Capped to 30, and their is a Minimum of level 3 to each class. Once you have taken 3 levels, you can dump single levels anywhere. E.G 3 Monk / 3 Cleric / 3 Rouge / 2 Monk / 1 Cleric / 8 Rouge/ 2 Monk. After you have taken the Minimul of 3 Levels, you can pick and mix as you feel not requiring a further 3 levels at a time.

If any other Arelithians can add random knowledge to this, please do.
If any builders have any questions, please ask and I will try to answer.
